snippet: About a quarter of indie films put women in crucial behind-the-scenes roles; the figure is 16 percent in studio projects.
abstract: About a quarter of indie films put women in crucial behind-the-scenes roles; the figure is 16 percent in studio projects.

headline.main: For Female Filmmakers, Indies Provide More Work Than Studios, Study Finds
headline.print_headline: Women Fare Well in Indie Filmmaking
